page.title: 01Scunthorpe: an introduction
page.content: Our block contains the majority of the town of Scunthorpe. Although it does not include the town centre, it contains within it many of the features which give Scunthorpe its identity. A large part of the{Appleby- {Frodingham steelworks}is within the block, as are the town's major road link, the{A18,}and the{railway {station.}The block is mainly residential, but contains the{General {Hospital,}the{Museum,}most of the schools and both the colleges providing 16-19 education. Our block also contains features of old and new Scunthorpe:{Brumby Hall and{St Lawrence's church,}for example, as well as the modern{Civic Centre}and {Central Park.}
